channel.title: Projects on Ahmad Kamiludin
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Ahmad Kamiludin

item.title: Project 4: Analysis Of Factors Affecting Coconut Production In Lumajang Regency, East Java, Indonesia, Using Rapid Miner
item.description: Business Understanding: Lumajang Regency is one of the areas in the southern part of East Java Province, Indonesia. Lumajang Regency has considerable potential in the agricultural, plantation, and other sectors. In the plantation sector, the most extensive use of the area in Lumajang Regency in 2021 is the Coconut harvested area of 7,939 ha with a production yield of 8,259.78 tons. Then followed by 3,962.5 hectares of robusta coffee plantations with a production of 1,312.

item.title: Project 3: Consumer Behavior Analysis At Blangkon Caf√© Using Knime Analytics
item.description: Business Understanding: Blangkon Cafe is a company engaged in the food and beverage sector. Currently, Blangkon Cafe is growing rapidly and focuses on selling various types of Traditional and Modern food and beverages. Blangkon Cafe will focus on increasing sales innovation so that it can continue to increase sales profit. Data Understanding: The dataset used contains the Date and Time, Receipt ID, Product Name, Product Category, Number of Products, and so on.

item.title: Project 2: Sentiment Analysis Of TAMPIL'S Application
item.description: This project analyzes the reviews given by Users on the TAMPIL application on the Google Play store. The TAMPIL application is a platform for hosting webinars or community events and partners using the TAMPIL video conference service. This application is owned by PT Bisa Artificial Indonesia, which is located in Bandung, West Java, Indonesia. This project is my last project or Final Project as a participant in Master On Job Training at BISA AI Academy, which is carried out for 1 month.

item.title: Project 1: Country Clustering Analysis
item.description: The project analyzes data from the HELP International Organization, where Chief Executive Officers need to decide how to use their money strategically and effectively. So, the Chief Executive Officer must decide to select the countries most in need of assistance. The purpose of this analysis is to categorize countries using the socioeconomic and health factors that determine the country’s overall development. After understanding the data, I did Exploratory Data Analysis (EDA) which consisted of Handling Missing Value, Univariate Analysis, Bivariate Analysis, and Multivariate Analysis.
